item.title: Sarah add a quote by Walt Whitman
item.description: "Have you reckon’d a thousand acres much? have you reckon’d the earth much? Have you practis’d so long to learn to read? Have you felt so proud to get at the meaning of poems?" -- Walt Whitman

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Walt Whitman
Sarah add a quote by Milan Kundera
item.description: "Dogs are our link to paradise. They don't know evil or jealousy or discontent. To sit with a dog on a hillside on a glorious afternoon is to be back in Eden, where doing nothing was not boring--it was peace." -- Milan Kundera

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "The earth laughs in flowers." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson
